metadata.title: CVE-2022-34300 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In tinyexr 1.0.1, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in tinyexr::DecodePixelData.

notes.note: amurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap

criterions.comment: asymptote package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
